divs: Sighting DetailsA large Blue meteor like fire ball fell from the sky. I was driving home from Brighton and saw it. My room mate saw debris fall into a neer by car dealership. Police and fire trucks in the area, Claim to be investigating a hostage situation. To many Police to believe that. Media helicopters in route were removed by military helos. Large mass of people are watching the area, I cam't be the only one who saw it.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Littleton
There were no other sightings in Littleton on or around October 28th 2008
Summary: Large blue Fire Ball fell from Sky
